channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Democrats Who Ignored Biden’s ‘Aggressive’ Tax Avoidance Act Outraged Dr. Oz May Have Underpaid

item.title: History Ended Five Years Ago
item.description: Even as the people who misled us about Covid-19 make embarrassing admissions, so much is unknown — putting a shadow on all history before it.

item.title: Milei Isn’t Out of the Woods Yet
item.description: Milei has not yet been able to rid Argentina of its maze of capital controls, despite his promises to do so.

item.title: We Must Restore the U.S. Agency for Global Media, Not Eliminate It
item.description: Repressive regimes have failed to block the agency’s promotion of freedom around the world. Doing so ourselves could have drastic consequences.

item.title: Eric Migicovsky says Apple makes it ‘nearly impossible’ for developers to create an experience that rivals the Apple Watch, adding claims about security are ‘what they tell you as they tuck you into bed’
item.description: "They’re clearly using their market power to lock consumers into their walled ecosystem," he added.

item.title: House Dems undercut Jeffries on Schumer's leadership as Left's messaging woes persist
item.description: Democrats are still criticizing Senate Minority Leader Chuck Schumer even as House Minority Leader Hakeem Jeffries seeks to mend the public divide.

item.title: Trump and Putin teased ‘enormous economic deals’ in their call—but U.S. companies will experience a very different Russia if they return
item.description: Russia has a new business elite and radically altered marketplace—and it’s done away with key legal protections.

item.title: DeSantis proposes solution as Trump's agenda is stymied by judges
item.description: As President Donald Trump's agenda is stymied by judges, Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis suggested Congress could strip federal courts of jurisdiction.

item.title: Trump admin demands NYC 'restore order' amid rampant crime or face billions in funding cuts
item.description: Transportation Sec. Sean Duffy says federal authorities are determined to "restore order" in New York City.

item.title: America Has Lost The Art Of Cursing
item.description: Our lazy overuse of curse words has destroyed a tool with which we can shock listeners at appropriate moments.

item.title: Why Tesla’s Cybertruck Is An American Icon
item.description: With his Cybertruck, Elon Musk brings the virtues of the past into the present.

item.title: Ending All Visas For Chinese Students Could Send Them Into The Arms Of The CCP
item.description: The recently introduced 'Stop CCP VISAs Act' could inflict more damage on U.S. national security than it prevents.
